ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-120 - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF A CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-120 in order to authorize the construction and operation of the Leismer to Kettle River Crossover project by NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
